sentence.Network_en: The company had once been uncompromisingly socialist.
sentence.Network_cn: 该公司曾一度坚定地走社会主义道路。

sentence.Network_en: He states uncompromisingly that he is opposed to any practices which oppress animals.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坚决声明反对任何虐待动物的行为。

sentence.Network_en: With sharp eyes and keen sensibility, she has uncompromisingly tackled the hot issues in China.
sentence.Network_cn: 她文笔犀利,目光敏锐, 理性训练充分,行文切中社会热点问题.

PerfectNetExp.abs: uncompromising 不妥协的uncompromisingly 坚决地unconcern 不关心
uncompression 解压缩, uncompromisingly 不妥协地, uncompromising 不调合的

list.abs: 拒绝的... ... 严词拒绝 to refuse in stern words 坚决拒绝 to refuse uncompromisingly 找借口拒绝 to find excuses to refuse.

entry.tran: 不妥协的；不让步的；坚定的
entry.def: If you describe someone as uncompromising, you mean that they are determined not to change their opinions or aims in any way.

example.ex: Mrs Thatcher was a tough and uncompromising politician.
example.tran: 撒切尔夫人是一位态度强硬、不轻易妥协的政治家。

entry.def: If you describe something as uncompromising, you mean that it does not attempt to make something that is shocking or unpleasant any more acceptable to people.

auth_sentence.content: Something in her uncompromisingly clear gaze unnerved him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Something in her uncompromisingly clear gaze unnerved him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Something in her uncompromisingly clear gaze unnerved him.

auth_sentence.content: His material was uncompromisingly to his own taste, filled with wild tirades about apparent trivialities.
auth_sentence.res_content: His material was uncompromisingly to his own taste, filled with wild tirades about apparent trivialities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His material was uncompromisingly to his own taste, filled with wild tirades about apparent trivialities.

sentences.en: With sharp eyes and keen sensibility, she has uncompromisingly tackled the hot issues in China.
sentences.cn: 她文笔犀利，目光敏锐，理性训练充分，行文切中社会热点问题。
